name: Ecopreneur.eu European Sustainable Business Federation
goal: Ecopreneur.eu is the European Sustainable Business Federation of seven national associations whose common aim is a new economic framework in which sustainability is promoted, the environment respected and ecological principles are followed. Ecopreneur.eu represents over 2000 sustainable companies - mostly SMEs.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Circular Economy Package
Green Action Plan for SMEs
Green Fiscal Reform
Horizon 2020
